Pr\u00e9requis: Etre inscrit au Mastère Spécialisé "Infrastructure Project Finance"
Objectifs du module: - To give participants the most used skills to use Excel for general purpose and to import and export data from and forward other software or tools. - To make participants able to understand and adapt macro functions found on tutorials or written by other colleagues.
Programme du module: Contents - handling of essential tools and; - training with most used formulas; - importing, exporting and converting data; - analysing big amount of data with pivot tables; - understanding and tuning macro functions with Visual Basic®
